passive.name: Unfulfilled Yearning
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> and increases their Max HP by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer is attacked or consumes their own HP, their DMG increases by <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong>. This effect is removed after the wearer uses an attack.
